Description: Oracle database access and management tools
Author: Micube MCP Framework

Tools.Name: Query
Tools.Description: Execute SELECT queries and return structured results with metadata. this tool is used for searching detail.

Parameters.Name: sql
Parameters.Description: SQL SELECT query to execute. Only SELECT and WITH statements are allowed. before ganerating this parameter you have to know the exactly proper Table name.

Tools.Name: Command
Tools.Description: Execute SQL commands (CREATE, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, etc.) that modify database structure or data

Parameters.Name: sql
Parameters.Description: SQL command to execute (DDL/DML). Dangerous commands like DROP DATABASE are blocked for safety.

Tools.Name: GetDatabaseInfo
Tools.Description: Retrieve comprehensive database schema information including tables, columns, indexes, and database metadata.

Tools.Name: TestConnection
Tools.Description: Test database connectivity and return connection status and performance metrics
